channel.title: nfs on Morgoth
channel.description: Recent content in nfs on Morgoth

item.title: Nfs
item.description: NFS NFS: Network File System 安装： # 在nfs服务器安装nfs服务 $ sudo apt-get install nfs-kernel-server # 添加共享目录并授权 $ sudo vim /etc/exports /home/user/share *(rw,no_root_squash) $ sudo service nfs-kernel-server restart # 在nfs客户端安装nfs客户端 $ sudo apt-get install nfs-common
